name: Love Is... ...in Bloom: The Flower Shop Garden
overview: Full of the same endearing charm as the original cartoons you get to work on a blossoming relationship as well as a growing business. Twelve varied and unique arcade-style games provide fun, long-term challenges. Build your own floral empire. Starting from the very first seed and building up, upgrading the garden and stocking the shop to supply made-to-order bouquets to the public.
